aima.core.logic.propositional.parsing.ast

Class ComplexSentence

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.logic.propositional.parsing.ast.Sentence
      • aima.core.logic.propositional.parsing.ast.ComplexSentence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParseTreeNode

    public class ComplexSentence
extends Sentence
    Artificial Intelligence A Modern Approach (3rd Edition): page 244.

    Complex Sentence: are constructed from simpler sentences, using parentheses (and square brackets) and logical connectives.
    Author:
    Ciaran O'Reilly, Ravi Mohan

      • getConnective

        public Connective getConnective()
        Overrides:
        getConnective in class Sentence
        Returns:
        the logical connective associated with this sentence if it has one (i.e. is a ComplexSentence), null otherwise.

      • getNumberSimplerSentences

        public int getNumberSimplerSentences()
        Overrides:
        getNumberSimplerSentences in class Sentence
        Returns:
        the number of simpler sentences contained in this sentence. Will only be > 0 if a Complex Sentence.

      • getSimplerSentence

        public Sentence getSimplerSentence(int offset)
        Description copied from class: Sentence
        Get the simplified sentence, at the specified offset (starts at 0), contained by this Sentence if it is a Complex Sentence, null otherwise.
        Overrides:
        getSimplerSentence in class Sentence
        Parameters:
        offset - the offset of the contained simplified sentence to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the simplified sentence, at the specified offset, contained by this sentence (if a complex sentence), null otherwise.
